participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and motivated, Jordan enjoys engaging with others and is passionate about his interests.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. my favourite artist is travis scott. i like playing basketball. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, Emily finds joy in nurturing her hobbies and values community connections.
participant_2.background: i've a dogs. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
